Okechukwu Anthony Onyegbule // (listen)born October 23, 1969), nke a maara dịka Okey Bakassi// (listen) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2014, o meriri na "Best Actor in a Leading Role (Igbo) na mbipụta 2014 nke Best of Nollywood Awards maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Onye Ozi
Okey Bakassi na-achọ ntụrụndụ mgbe niile n'agbanyeghị na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ nke River State nke ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ enweghị ngalaba nka ihe nkiri
Okay Bakassi na ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ nwere otu uche na mmasị gbakọtara ọnụ iji mepụta otu 'Theatre Kolleagues' maka ebumnuche nke ime ihe nkiri na ime ihe na-atọ ndị obodo mahadum ụtọ

Okey, mgbe ọ gụsịrị mahadum bịara Lagos ma mesịa zute onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi a ma ama, Zeb Ejiro onye nyere ya ohere mbụ ya n'afọ 1993 ịpụta na mmepụta telivishọn - 'Fortunes' ebe ọ na-egwu Nick, otu n'ime ndị nche Johnson.
